detail_desc: Shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and diagonal side pockets.
Short coat in soft, felted fabric with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal front pockets and sewn-on tabs at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined at the top.
Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short, V-neck dress in a softly draping viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Straight-cut blouse in a crisp organic cotton weave with smocking at the top. Square neckline with concealed elastication to keep the blouse in place, short, wide sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with 3/4-length sleeves and ribbed cuffs. High slits with a decorative button at the sides for easier nursing access.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Passport cover in embossed imitation leather with an embroidered motif and three card compartments inside. Size 10x15 cm.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with metal buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Straight-style jumper in a knit made partly from recycled polyester with a rib-knit polo neck. Dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long dress in an airy patterned weave. Double layer at the top, short sleeves with slits, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Elasticated scrunchies in pleated satin.

Blouse in a softly draping jacquard weave with a collar, covered buttons down the front and a double-layered, gathered yoke front and back. Long balloon sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jersey playsuit in a patterned cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps, side pockets and an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck front and back with a flounce, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and straight legs.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Polo shirt in premium cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Gently fitted, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, gathered, 3/4-length sleeves, jetted side pockets and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Sports shorts in heavy jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Blouse in airy chiffon with 3/4-length sleeves and two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.
Cotton jersey top with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Calf-length, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with pleats front and back. Round neck with an opening at the top that fastens with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, long raglan sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a button placket, chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge ribbing around the neckline and ribbed cuffs.
Short top in stretch jersey with a motif on the front, a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves.

Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist and decorative V-shaped yoke at the top. Relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a flock print on the chest and zip down the front with a chin guard. Hood with a contrasting colour, patterned jersey lining, a kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized, straight-cut top in soft faux shearling with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fine-knit inside.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a gently flared skirt.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in textured chiffon with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Short-sleeved cotton piqué top with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the top. Press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y) and narrow ribbing at the hems.

Short dress in a slightly stretchy, textured weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, double-layered puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with a double-breasted front. Unlined.
Boleros in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a button at the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with open sides and heel straps with covered elastication. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with braided sections and pompoms on the front. Low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jacket in soft washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, fake flap pockets with a button at the top, and press-studs at the cuffs.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves.
Short, double-breasted kimono in patterned satin with notch lapels and concealed press-studs at the front. Long sleeves with wide cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
Scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs. No thumbs.
Short, fitted jersey top with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Jersey vest top with a print motif, braided trim around the front of the neckline and a wide, asymmetric hem with an overlocked edge.
Short cardigan knitted in fluffy yarn with long sleeves and no buttons.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a unique nursing feature and lace-trimmed V-neck. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Lightly padded gilet with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, a zipped inner pocket and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric a print motif on one leg and wide, elasticated ribbing with a drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy, textured jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neck, seam and flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Suede boots with lacing at the front. Fabric linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Gently fitted jacket in a textured weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, ties at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit cardigan in soft organic cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Short skirt in a spot-patterned weave with a faux wrapover at the front, draping with ties at one side and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a hanger at the back. Gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy jersey with a textured pattern, seam at the waist and side pockets.
